0.text: Innate: Miss Fortune's basic attacks are empowered to apply a mark that expires upon attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 50% − 100% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage, halved to 25% − 50% (based on level) AD against  minions.
0.html: Innate: Miss Fortune's basic attacks are empowered to apply a mark that expires upon attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 50% − 100% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage, halved to 25% − 50% (based on level) AD against minions.
markedPassages: 50% − 100% (based on level) AD
25% − 50% (based on level) AD
minions

3.text: TARGET RANGE:  MISS FORTUNE'S  ATTACK RANGE

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage, which then bounces to hit another enemy behind them. This applies on-attack effects to the first enemy hit, and  on-hit effects to both enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage, which then bounces to hit another enemy behind them. This applies on-attack effects to the first enemy hit, and on-hit effects to both enemies hit.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Double Up's bounce is affected by  critical strike modifiers. If Double Up kills the primary target, the bounce will  critically strike.
1.html: Double Up's bounce is affected by critical strike modifiers. If Double Up kills the primary target, the bounce will critically strike.
markedPassages: critical strike
critically strike

2.text: The bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target. A target does not have to be  visible be hit by the bounce.
2.html: The bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target. A target does not have to be visible be hit by the bounce.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target. A target does not have to be  visible be hit by the bounce.

0.text: Passive: Miss Fortune gains  25 bonus movement speed after 5 seconds without taking non- persistent damage. This bonus is increased after another 5 seconds, and is granted instantly whenever Strut is cast or upon respawning.
0.html: Passive: Miss Fortune gains  25 bonus movement speed after 5 seconds without taking non- persistent damage. This bonus is increased after another 5 seconds, and is granted instantly whenever Strut is cast or upon respawning.
markedPassages: 25 bonus movement speed
persistent

1.text: Active: Miss Fortune gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
1.html: Active: Miss Fortune gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

2.text: Marking a new target with  Love Tap reduces Strut's  current cooldown by 2 seconds.
2.html: Marking a new target with Love Tap reduces Strut's  current cooldown by 2 seconds.
markedPassages: Love Tap
current cooldown

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune casts a storm of bullets at the target location for 2 seconds, granting  sight of the area, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within, and  slowing them by 40% (+ 6% per 100 AP).
0.html: Active: Miss Fortune casts a storm of bullets at the target location for 2 seconds, granting sight of the area, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within, and slowing them by 40% (+ 6% per 100 AP).
markedPassages: sight
slowing

1.text: Make It Rain will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Make It Rain will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Make It Rain will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune  channels for up to 3 seconds, firing a number of waves of bullets in the target direction. Each wave is in a spread of 6 projectiles that deals 75% AD (+ 25% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Miss Fortune channels for up to 3 seconds, firing a number of waves of bullets in the target direction. Each wave is in a spread of 6 projectiles that deals 75% AD (+ 25% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: channels

1.text: Each of the waves can  critically strike for (20% +  7%) bonus physical damage.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks ( on-hit / on-attack) grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
